definition: what are you doing?/what's he up to?
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc

sentences.english: What should you do then on those sleepless nights?
sentences.chinese: 那么你在睡不着的夜晚干什么才好呢？

sentences.english: What do people do in these days?
sentences.chinese: 人们在这些天都干什么呢？

sentences.english: "What will you do?" Eva would ask him.
I think we all know what lawyers can do with evidence.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我们都知道律师能够用证据来干什么。

sentences.english: He keeps his opponents guessing what he would do next.
sentences.chinese: 他使他的对手猜不着他下一步要干什么。

sentences.english: Well, Chris, what are you doing over at Joyce's?
sentences.chinese: 那么，克里斯你在卓伊丝家干什么？

sentences.english: What's with the fancy hairdryer, and stuff?
sentences.chinese: 那高级的吹风机和那些东西干什么用？

sentences.english: I'm sure he'll be telling Detective Modine what he was doing.
sentences.chinese: 我保证他会告诉摩丁侦探他在干什么。

sentences.english: I have more squires than I know what to do with.
sentences.chinese: 我的侍从多的不知道该打发他们去干什么。

sentences.english: They bought the place they can do whatever they want to the ballroom right?
sentences.chinese: 中国人既然买了那个跳舞厅，想要干什么就能干什么。

sentences.english: They bought the place they can do whatever they want to the ballroom right?
sentences.chinese: 中国人既然买了那个跳舞厅，想要干什么就能干什么。

sentences.english: What are they doing? They're listening to a CD.
sentences.chinese: 他们在干什么他们在听CD光盘。

sentences.english: What do I now want to do with this variable?
But then again, I have had a hard time understanding the G. O. P. for a while now.
sentences.chinese: 不过，老实说，我早已不明白共和党究竟在干什么。

sentences.english: What are you, a rocket scientist?
sentences.chinese: 你是干什么的，火箭专家么？

sentences.english: IF and WHEN both looked at the man and wondered what he wanted.
sentences.chinese: “如果”和“等到”看着这个人，不知道他想干什么。

definition: what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
variant of 怎麼了|怎么了[zen3 me5 le5]
what's the matter?/what's going on?/how could that be?/how did that come about?/what's it all about?
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
